titleStmt.title: An Act for the better propagation and preaching of the Gospel in VVales, and redress of some grievances. Die Veneris, 22. Februarii, 1649. Ordered by the Parliament, that this Act be forthwith printed and published. Hen. Scobel, Cleric. Parliamenti.
Public General Acts. 1650-02-22.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Francis Tyton, for the use of the Commissioners of Wales,

notesStmt.note: The year of the Act is given according to Lady Day dating.
